meta.dc:title: HJ 80 ENR: Approving the request of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for a waiver under section 1703E(f) of title 38, United States Code.

meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
Approving the request of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for a waiver under section 1703E(f) of title 38, United States Code.

main.name: HJRES80
main.longTitle: JOINT RESOLUTION Approving the request of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for a waiver under section 1703E(f) of title 38, United States Code.
main.enactingFormula: Resolved by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.content: That Congress approves the request for a waiver under section 1703E(f) of title 38, United States Code, as submitted by the Secretary on December 6, 2019.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
